description:
Ace is to be executed in a matter of hours, and Magellan`s toxic breath is singeing the back of Luffy`s neck. Ivan uses a devastating Death Wink to buy some time, but the warden`s Poison Hydra may be more than he can handle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il faut arrêter Magellan ! Ivankov dévoile son attaque secrète !
Magellan o Tomero! Iva-san Ougi Sakuretsu
Stop Magellan! Ivan-san`s Esoteric Technique Explodes
أوقف ماجيلان! انفجار تقنيّة إيفان-سان الخفيّة!
マゼランを止めろ! イワさん奥義炸裂
